title: Rescued
description: All I need is a getaway. A rest from my parents, and the wedding they're arranging for me...Enter fate and a missed connection that proves different plans.Three handsome men, and a ranch in the mountain's of Wyoming.I can't walk away from this.Mac is handsome and clever, seducing me with words.Donnie is the protector who will do anything to keep me safe.And Lorenzo? Well, he just wonâ€™t take no for an answer.Would it be wrong to stay here forever?It sounds like a dream until my parents send out a search party and unveil secrets even I didn't know were coming.Steam that leaves you buzzing. HEA Guarantee.*This title contains dark elements that may not be suitable for all readers. *
author: Ava Quinn
